mapper.select: SELECT a.transactionDate, ai.itemId, at.value, ai.direction FROM erp_db.accounting a LEFT JOIN account_transaction at ON a.accountingId = at.accountingId LEFT JOIN account_item ai ON ai.itemId = at.itemId LEFT JOIN sale s ON s.saleId = a.saleId LEFT JOIN orderStmt o ON o.orderId = a.orderId WHERE a.transactionDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND (a.saleId IS NOT NULL OR a.orderId IS NOT NULL) AND (s.storeId = #{storeId} OR o.storeId = #{storeId}) ORDER BY a.transactionDate;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO accounting(orderId, transactionDate) VALUES(#{orderId}, CURDATE());

INSERT INTO account_transaction(accountingId,itemId,value,direction) VALUES((SELECT accountingId FROM accounting WHERE orderId = #{orderId} AND isEntry = 0),(SELECT itemId FROM account_item WHERE name = '재고자산'),#{purchasePrice}*#{purchaseQty},'차변');

INSERT INTO account_transaction(accountingId,itemId,value,direction) VALUES((SELECT accountingId FROM accounting WHERE orderId = #{orderId} AND isEntry = 0),(SELECT itemId FROM account_item WHERE name = '미지급금'),#{purchasePrice}*#{purchaseQty},'대변');
mapper.update: UPDATE accounting SET isEntry = 1 WHERE orderId = #{orderId} AND isEntry = 0;
